org.freezedry.persistence.readers

Interface PersistenceReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonReader, KeyValueReader, XmlReader

    public interface PersistenceReader
    Reads the format specified by the implementing class into the semantic model it creates and returns. The semantic model is represented by the root InfoNode returned by the #read(Class, InputStream) method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InfoNode read(java.lang.Class<?> clazz, java.io.Reader input)
      Reads the input stream into a semantic model represented by the return root InfoNode.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        InfoNode read(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
            java.io.Reader input)
        Reads the input stream into a semantic model represented by the return root InfoNode.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class to use as a template for creating the semantic model. This is effectively the "target" class.
        input - The input stream from which to read the persisted object.
        Returns:
        The root InfoNode representing the semantic model.
